description: This file defines Pydantic data models for handling notes, including schemas for creation, updating, and output, with validation constraints.

classes.name: NoteBase
classes.description: Base schema for a note containing title and content with validation constraints.

classes.name: NoteCreate
classes.description: Schema for creating a new note, inherits from NoteBase.

classes.name: NoteUpdate
classes.description: Schema for updating an existing note with optional fields for partial updates.

classes.name: NoteOut
classes.description: Schema used for returning a note, includes an ID and config for attribute mapping.

methods.name: NoteBase.__init__
methods.description: Initializes a NoteBase object with title and content.

methods.name: NoteCreate.__init__
methods.description: Initializes a NoteCreate object, inherits from NoteBase.

methods.name: NoteUpdate.__init__
methods.description: Initializes a NoteUpdate object with optional title and content.

methods.name: NoteOut.__init__
methods.description: Initializes a NoteOut object, includes ID and configuration.

ctags.name: content
ctags.pattern: /^    content: str = Field(..., min_length=1, description="Full note content (non-empty).")$/

ctags.name: id
ctags.pattern: /^    id: int = Field(..., description="Database ID of the note.")$/

ctags.name: title
ctags.pattern: /^    title: str = Field(..., min_length=1, max_length=200, description="Short note title (1-200 c/
